title: ** User logs into the system with valid credentials
preconditions: The user is at the login page: https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/login
The user has access to a web browser
main_flow: 4. System verifies the entered credentials against the database
5. If the credentials are valid, the system displays a success message: "Success! Welcome to the site."
6. User is redirected to the secure area of the site
If the entered username or password is incorrect, the system displays an error message: "Invalid username or password."
If the user enters incorrect credentials multiple times, the system locks the user account for a certain period
postconditions: The user is logged into the system
The user is in the secure area of the site
The user can access secure features and functionalities
4. The user can logout from the secure area at any time.
